app_name: My Talking Tom Friends for Android - Free App Download
about_section: My Talking Tom Friends is a casual game developed by Outfit7 Limited. The APK has been available since February 2020 . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 7.7 million times. It's top ranked. It's rated 4.36 out of 5 stars, based on 3.4 million ratings. The last update of the app was on May 20, 2025 . My Talking Tom Friends has a content rating "Everyone" . My Talking Tom Friends has an APK download size of 161.91 MB and the latest version available is 25.2.1.14683 . Designed for Android version 6.0+ . My Talking Tom Friends is FREE to download.
app_description:
Join Talking Tom, Angela, Hank, Ginger, Ben, and Becca in the most exciting virtual pet adventure! Dive into a world of cool animals and endless fun! Visit their house and see why they are the ultimate pet friends!
Here's why you'll love playing with them:
- Take Care of All Six Friends: Interact with your favorite characters in one house! Feed, bathe, dress, and put them to sleep. Talk, play, and engage with Tom, Angela, Hank, Ginger, Ben, and Becca. Each character has their unique personality and needs.
- Design and Create Stories: Bring all your characters together to create and share fun stories. Your imagination is the limit!
- Creative and Sporty Activities: From gardening to chilling in the pool and playing musical instruments, there's always something fun to do.
- Closet Full of Fun Fashions: Dress up your friends in the latest styles. Unlock new outfits daily and show off your fashion sense!
- House Customization: Decorate and upgrade their house to make it the coolest home in town. Collect tokens and rewards to enhance your living space.
- Mini Games: Enjoy a variety of mini-games, from puzzles to action-packed challenges. There's something for everyone!
- Collect Stickers and Rewards: Complete your sticker album to earn special rewards and unlock whacky food items. Feed your virtual friends and watch their hilarious reactions.
- Daily Trips to Town: Travel to different locations to shop for exciting new items and bring back surprises.
From Outfit7, creators of My Talking Tom, My Talking Tom 2 and My Talking Angela 2.
This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Subscriptions which automatically renew at the end of a subscription period unless cancelled. You can manage and cancel your subscription any time via Settings in your Google Play account;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress;
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.
Terms of use: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/eula/en/
Privacy policy for games: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/privacy-policy-games/en
Customer support: support@outfit7.com
Recent changes:
NEW: SCREEN RECORDING & EMOTIONS
- Capture funny videos directly in-game
- Set the scene with funny emotions
- Make the friends act sad, angry, happy, in love and more!
